snippet: The Obamas' anniversary is the same night as the first presidential debate, and their good friend David Axelrod is circulating an anniversary card -- and asking for campaign donations.
abstract: The Obamas' anniversary is the same night as the first presidential debate, and their good friend David Axelrod is circulating an anniversary card -- and asking for campaign donations.

headline.main: Latest Obama Fund-Raising Gambit: Their 20th Anniversary
